# Dogology HealthSpan Kits

> Science-built food for more good years.

Dogology is a subscription meal-kit service for dogs that combines canine metabolic modeling (MER), AAFCO-aligned nutrition, USDA FoodData Central nutrient data, and transparent sourcing into weekly cook-at-home kits.

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://dogkit.vercel.app/
- Plan Builder (MER calculator): https://dogkit.vercel.app/plan/
- Ingredient Database: https://dogkit.vercel.app/ingredients/
- Recipe Builder: https://dogkit.vercel.app/recipe/
- Technical Specs: https://dogkit.vercel.app/specs/

## Full Documentation

For the complete technical specifications, research summaries, ingredient database, and business documentation in plain text:

- llms-full.txt: https://dogkit.vercel.app/llms-full.txt
